title: Bewitching Embrace: Sensual Fantasy Romance
description: Aislinn found a new place in the small town of Mystic, Massachusetts to recover from a broken heart and to survive as a practicing witch with her cat Freya. She's been missing Jericho, the only man she'd ever loved even if he's betrayed her. Little did she know he was trying to find her. And find her he did. He also did not betray her, but he was the one betrayed. Now that they're together, the danger that's almost killed Jericho could be looking for them both. And that Jericho wasn't what he simply appeared to be. Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: HOW PLEASUREFUL DO YOU LIKE YOUR STORIES? This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex, masturbation, and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
